senselogic.sitevision.api.link

Interface CustomLinkRenderData


  • public interface CustomLinkRenderData
    Custom link data that enables custom data attributes when rendering for specific link URLs.
    Since:
    Sitevision 4.0.4
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren
    See Also:
    CustomLinkProcessor.getRenderData(String)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getDataAttributes()
      Returns the data attributes that should be used when rendering a link accepted by the CustomLinkProcessor.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataAttributes

        Map<String,String> getDataAttributes()
        Returns the data attributes that should be used when rendering a link accepted by the CustomLinkProcessor.

        Notes about entry keys:

        • A key that is null or whitespace-only will be completely ignored, i.e. no data attribute will be rendered.
        • A key that isn't properly prefixed with "data-" will be prefixed when the data attribute is rendered.

        Notes about entry values:

        • A value that is null or whitespace-only will be rendered as a data attribute without value.
        • A value should not be escaped, it will be escaped when it is rendered (typically via EndecUtil.escapeXML(String)).
        Returns:
        the data attributes that should be used when rendering a link accepted by the CustomLinkProcessor

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
